amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the use of third-party contractors to conduct medical disability examinations of veterans for purposes of obtaining disability compensation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3430 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3430 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
